alert.note: Alert for Fannin; Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 4:48PM CST until March 02 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Lamar County in north central Texas... Northeastern Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 545 PM CST. * At 447 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crockett Lake, or 21 miles northeast of Bonham, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paris, Lake Crook, Powderly, Sumner, Crockett Lake, Arthur City, Coffee Mill Lake, Pat Mayse Lake, Camp Maxey, Lake Gibbons, Novice, Telephone, Midcity, Direct, Globe, Elwood, East Direct, Monkstown, Forest Chapel and Garretts Bluff. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
